###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlSlider_GetThumbRectEx

###Description###
Retrieves the size and position of the bounding rectangle for the slider

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiSlider.au3>
_GUICtrlSlider_GetThumbRectEx($hWnd)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to the control
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: $tagRECT structure that receives the bounding rectangle of the slider in client coordinates

###Remarks###
None.
